title: Calculate the Arctangent of Two Variables
description: This function computes the arctangent (angle) given two parameters Y and X, which correspond to the coordinates on a Cartesian plane. The function applies different mathematical rules based on the values of X and Y to determine the correct angle in radians.
name: ATAN2

input.name: Y
input.description: The Y-coordinate used to calculate the arctangent.

input.name: X
input.description: The X-coordinate used to calculate the arctangent.

output.name: ATAN2
output.description: The resulting angle in radians based on the input coordinates Y and X.

return_value.description: The angle in radians computed from the given Y and X coordinates.
